Test Case Name: Successfully Submit Contact Form with All Fields
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Navigate to Home Page.
2. Click 'Contact Us' link.
3. Fill Name: `John Doe`, Email: `john.doe@example.com`, Subject: `Inquiry`, Message: `This is a test message.`.
4. Click 'Submit' button.
5. Click OK on alert.
Expected Result: Success message 'Success! Your details have been submitted successfully.' is displayed. Clicking 'Home' navigates back to Home page.

Test Case Name: Successfully Submit Contact Form with File Upload (Conceptual)
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Navigate to Contact Us.
2. Fill Name, Email, Subject, Message.
3. Click 'Choose File' and select a small image/text file.
4. Click 'Submit' button.
5. Click OK on alert.
Expected Result: Success message displayed. File is seemingly uploaded.
